properties.comment: 获取项目以及所属物业公司sql
properties.entry: select b.code,b.name,b.companyCode,b.companyName from mid_project_house a inner join main_project b on a.projectId = b.id where a.houseId = #houseId#
select mp.companyCode,mp.companyName,mp.code,mc.name as projectName from main_carport mc INNER JOIN main_project mp on mc.projectId=mp.id where mc.id=#carportId#
